wsintelliauction.lib.task
Class Task

java.lang.Object
  wsintelliauction.lib.task.Task
Direct Known Subclasses:
NullTask
public abstract class Task
extends java.lang.Object

Abstract super-class for all tasks. A task represents a unit of work, which the particular application must handle. This class is derived into many subclasses, where each subclass defines what exactly the particular task must do. A task backlog stores all tasks still to be executed, and the task manager handles execution of tasks. Derived subclasses will aggregate all references which might be required for this task to be realized. The taskmanager services each task, calling the perform() function.

Author:
James Lewis
